channel.title: Getting server online
channel.description:
Best people,
I downloaded an source called skorgescape, at first i was playing on local just run it and play for editing, but was my first server so maked an new home, starter new train xp new, tried to add somenew stuff didnt go that good :P
so after i was sure i wasnt leeching it anymore, cause i hear most people hate leechers, i wanted to put it online,
so i changed all 127.0.0.1 and skorgescape.no-ip.biz to my no-ip.... then tried to log in on my own no-ip, didnt work so tried 127.0.0.1 again. and guess what? 127.0.0.1 is working and not the no-ip. and yes i compiled it, so some 1 know what i did wrong i checked all filed on 127.0.0.1 and couldnt find 1....
already thanks, silencery joey

item.title: Getting server online
item.dc:creator: @elvemaqe elvemaqe
item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

yea i did portforward, k i try wat mr despair says.
btw didnt work,

Read full topic

item.title: Getting server online
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

See if this works. Change the previous IP to “localhost” like in gui.java change the serverip to localhost for yourself. Then when you .rar the client make sure it’s your no-ip for people, but your copy stays localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting server online
item.dc:creator: @Hypocryte Hypocryte
item.description:
@Hypocryte wrote:

You need to open port 43594 on your router.

Go to http://portforward.com/ and scroll down until you find your router and click it for more instructions.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pkloldie wrote:

did you port foward…?

item.title: Getting server online
item.dc:creator: @elvemaqe elvemaqe
item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

Best people,

I downloaded an source called skorgescape,
at first i was playing on local just run it and play for editing,
but was my first server so maked an new home, starter new train xp new,
tried to add somenew stuff didnt go that good

so after i was sure i wasnt leeching it anymore, cause i hear most people hate leechers,
i wanted to put it online,

so i changed all 127.0.0.1 and skorgescape.no-ip.biz to my no-ip…
then tried to log in on my own no-ip, didnt work so tried 127.0.0.1 again.
and guess what? 127.0.0.1 is working and not the no-ip.
and yes i compiled it, so some 1 know what i did wrong i checked all filed on
127.0.0.1 and couldnt find 1…

already thanks,
silencery joey
